description:
Teague is a Greek boy (complete with national flag) who has a bit of a military look to him.
When I asked him if he likes boys or girls, he said he was "greedy", which I think is a fun way of saying he likes to give and receive attention from anyone.
His solo is crazy at the end. He warned me that he gets all sweaty and that it is a major workout. Next time I need to put a towel down wherever he is.
Teague says he also likes light bondage, and getting really dirty. So I think there is a chair in his future!
title: Teague - Solo
